Invocations for when the wind blows.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْــــــأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا)).
Invocations for when the wind blows.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma innee as-aluka khayraha wa-aAAoothu bika min sharriha.)
Invocations for when the wind blows.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, I ask You for it’s goodness and I take refuge with You from it’s evil.)

Invocations for when the wind blows.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهَا، وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا، وَخَيْرَ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا، وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا، وَشَرِّ مَا أُرْسِلَتْ بِهِ)).
Invocations for when the wind blows.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma innee as-aluka khayraha wakhayra ma feeha, wakhayra ma orsilat bih, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharriha, washarri ma feeha washarri ma orsilat bih.)
Invocations for when the wind blows.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, I ask You for it’s goodness, the good within it, and the good it was sent with, and I take refuge with You from it’s evil, the evil within it, and from the evil it was sent with.)
